subject: Shea Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
lead_paragraph: There isn’t much left of Shea Stadium anymore, with part of it disappearing every day as the Mets move toward Opening Day at Citi Field in April.
snippet: There isn’t much left of Shea Stadium anymore, with part of it disappearing every day as the Mets move toward Opening Day at Citi Field in April.
